TopicTitle: Can Some Identify The Installed Mods In This Video?

Articles.Content:
I'm pretty sure there is an atmosphere mod, a sound mod, and a slight part mod (the lights he turns on after he lands). I'm most interested in the sound mod as Kerbal is entirely to silent for my liking :)

[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ttH39dPxYFw[/url]

Cheers!

Carto

As far as I can see he's got:

[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24786"]Kerbal Alarm Clock[/URL]
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905"]EVE[/URL] for clouds
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92324"]Chatterer[/URL] for background noises
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98943"]Distant Object Enhancement[/URL] to make distant objects visible
[URL="http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57778"]Surface Mounted Stock-Alike Lights[/URL] Edited November 25, 2015 by Tex_NL
fixed link

The surface mounted stock alike lights redirected to what seemed to be not the forum. WOT notified me saying it was a malware website. You might wanna change that.

Edit: Your link contained http// rather than http://

[quote name='Sequinox']The surface mounted stock alike lights redirected to what seemed to be not the forum. WOT notified me saying it was a malware website. You might wanna change that.

Edit: Your link contained http// rather than http://[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the heads up. The link is now fixed.
